content:
TITLE: Configuring Root MkDocs YAML with Monorepo Plugin
DESCRIPTION: Example of a root MkDocs configuration file using the Monorepo plugin. It demonstrates how to include sub-configurations using the !include syntax in the navigation structure.
SOURCE: https://github.com/backstage/mkdocs-monorepo-plugin/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: yaml
CODE:
```
# /mkdocs.yml
site_name: Cats API

nav:
  - Intro: 'index.md'
  - Authentication: 'authentication.md'
  - API:
    - v1: '!include ./v1/mkdocs.yml'
    - v2: '!include ./v2/mkdocs.yml'

plugins:
  - monorepo
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Root MkDocs Configuration Example
DESCRIPTION: Example configuration for the root mkdocs.yml file showing how to include sub-documentation using the !include syntax and enable the monorepo plugin.
SOURCE: https://github.com/backstage/mkdocs-monorepo-plugin/blob/master/docs/index.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: yaml
CODE:
```
site_name: Cats API

nav:
  - Intro: 'index.md'
  - Authentication: 'authentication.md'
  - API:
    - v1: '!include ./v1/mkdocs.yml'
    - v2: '!include ./v2/mkdocs.yml'

plugins:
  - monorepo
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing MkDocs Monorepo Plugin with pip
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the MkDocs Monorepo Plugin using pip package manager. This snippet shows how to easily get started with the plugin using PyPI.
SOURCE: https://github.com/backstage/mkdocs-monorepo-plugin/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: terminal
CODE:
```
$ pip install mkdocs-monorepo-plugin
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing MkDocs Monorepo Plugin with pip
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the MkDocs Monorepo Plugin using pip package manager.
SOURCE: https://github.com/backstage/mkdocs-monorepo-plugin/blob/master/docs/index.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: terminal
CODE:
```
$ pip install mkdocs-monorepo-plugin
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Root MkDocs YAML with Glob Pattern
DESCRIPTION: Example of a root MkDocs configuration file using the Monorepo plugin with glob pattern support. It shows how to include multiple sub-configurations using the *include syntax.
SOURCE: https://github.com/backstage/mkdocs-monorepo-plugin/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: yaml
CODE:
```
# /mkdocs.yml
site_name: Cats System

nav:
  - Intro: 'index.md'
  - Components: '*include ./components/*/mkdocs.yml'
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Basic Mkdocs Configuration
DESCRIPTION: Example mkdocs.yml configuration showing how to enable the monorepo plugin.
SOURCE: https://github.com/backstage/mkdocs-monorepo-plugin/blob/master/docs/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: yaml
CODE:
```
site_name: Example Site

plugins:
  - monorepo
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Sub-MkDocs YAML for API v1
DESCRIPTION: Example of a sub-configuration MkDocs file for API version 1. It shows how to structure the navigation for a specific version or component of the documentation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/backstage/mkdocs-monorepo-plugin/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: yaml
CODE:
```
# /src/v1/mkdocs.yml
site_name: versions/v1

nav:
  - Reference: "reference.md"
  - Changelog: "changelog.md"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Sub-MkDocs YAML for API v2
DESCRIPTION: Example of a sub-configuration MkDocs file for API version 2. It demonstrates how to include version-specific pages like migration guides in the navigation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/backstage/mkdocs-monorepo-plugin/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: yaml
CODE:
```
# /src/v2/mkdocs.yml
site_name: versions/v2

nav:
  - Migrating to v2: "migrating.md"
  - Reference: "reference.md"
  - Changelog: "changelog.md"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: V1 Submodule MkDocs Configuration
DESCRIPTION: Configuration example for a v1 submodule showing how to structure documentation for version 1 of the API.
SOURCE: https://github.com/backstage/mkdocs-monorepo-plugin/blob/master/docs/index.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: yaml
CODE:
```
site_name: versions/v1

nav:
  - Reference: "reference.md"
  - Changelog: "changelog.md"

nav:
  - code-samples.md
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: V2 Submodule MkDocs Configuration
DESCRIPTION: Configuration example for a v2 submodule showing how to structure documentation for version 2 of the API.
SOURCE: https://github.com/backstage/mkdocs-monorepo-plugin/blob/master/docs/index.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: yaml
CODE:
```
site_name: versions/v2

nav:
  - Migrating to v2: "migrating.md"
  - Reference: "reference.md"
  - Changelog: "changelog.md"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: HTTP GET Endpoints for Cat API v2
DESCRIPTION: Collection of REST API endpoints for retrieving cat and breed information. Includes endpoints for listing all cats, listing breeds, filtering cats by breed, and searching cats by name or breed.
SOURCE: https://github.com/backstage/mkdocs-monorepo-plugin/blob/master/sample-docs/v2/docs/reference.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: http
CODE:
```
GET /v2/cats
GET /v2/breeds
GET /v2/breeds/:breed_name/cats
GET /v2/search?q={query}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Monorepo Navigation Example
DESCRIPTION: Example showing source and output mkdocs.yml files demonstrating navigation resolution.
SOURCE: https://github.com/backstage/mkdocs-monorepo-plugin/blob/master/docs/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: yaml
CODE:
```
# mkdocs.yml
site_name: Example Site

plugins:
  - monorepo

nav:
  - Getting Started: README.md
  - Design: '!include teams/design/mkdocs.yml'
  - Contributing: contributing.md

# teams/design/mkdocs.yml
site_name: design-folder-alias

nav:
  - Menus: components/menus.md
  - Tabs: components/tabs.md
  - Playback Buttons: components/playback-buttons.md
```

LANGUAGE: yaml
CODE:
```
site_name: Example Site

plugins:
  - monorepo

nav:
  - Getting Started: README.md
  - Design:
      - Menus: design-folder-alias/components/menus.md
      - Tabs: design-folder-alias/components/tabs.md
      - Playback Buttons: design-folder-alias/components/playback-buttons.md
  - Contributing: contributing.md
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Specifying Authorization Header for API Authentication
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates the format for including an access token in the Authorization header of an HTTP request to authenticate with the API. The header should use the Bearer token format.
SOURCE: https://github.com/backstage/mkdocs-monorepo-plugin/blob/master/sample-docs/docs/authentication.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: http
CODE:
```
Authorization: Bearer {access_token}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining Python Package Dependencies for MkDocs Monorepo Plugin
DESCRIPTION: This requirements file specifies the Python package dependencies needed for the MkDocs Monorepo Plugin. It includes MkDocs core, related plugins for git functionality, and utility packages with specific version constraints.
SOURCE: https://github.com/backstage/mkdocs-monorepo-plugin/blob/master/requirements.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
flake8>=3.7.8
mkdocs>=1.2.3
mkdocs-git-authors-plugin==0.3.2
mkdocs-git-revision-date-localized-plugin==0.5.0
python-slugify==4.0.1
importlib-metadata==4.13.0
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Displaying Example Source Filetree
DESCRIPTION: Terminal command and output showing the directory structure of an example project using the MkDocs Monorepo Plugin. This helps visualize how the documentation files are organized.
SOURCE: https://github.com/backstage/mkdocs-monorepo-plugin/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: terminal
CODE:
```
$ tree .

├── docs
│   ├── authentication.md
│   └── index.md
├── mkdocs.yml
├── v1
│   ├── docs
│   │   ├── changelog.md
│   │   └── reference.md
│   └── mkdocs.yml
└── v2
    ├── docs
    │   ├── changelog.md
    │   ├── migrating.md
    │   └── reference.md
    └── mkdocs.yml

5 directories, 10 files
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Displaying Example Rendered Filetree
DESCRIPTION: Terminal commands and output showing the directory structure after building the documentation with MkDocs. This demonstrates how the plugin merges multiple documentation sets into a single structure.
SOURCE: https://github.com/backstage/mkdocs-monorepo-plugin/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: terminal
CODE:
```
$ mkdocs build
$ tree ./site

├── 404.html
├── authentication
│   └── index.html
├── css
│   ├── base.css
│   ├── bootstrap-custom.min.css
│   └── font-awesome.min.css
├── fonts
│   ├── fontawesome-webfont.eot
│   ├── fontawesome-webfont.svg
│   ├── fontawesome-webfont.ttf
│   ├── fontawesome-webfont.woff
│   ├── fontawesome-webfont.woff2
│   ├── glyphicons-halflings-regular.eot
│   ├── glyphicons-halflings-regular.svg
│   ├── glyphicons-halflings-regular.ttf
│   ├── glyphicons-halflings-regular.woff
│   └── glyphicons-halflings-regular.woff2
├── img
│   ├── favicon.ico
│   └── grid.png
├── index.html
├── js
│   ├── base.js
│   ├── bootstrap-3.0.3.min.js
│   └── jquery-1.10.2.min.js
├── sitemap.xml
├── sitemap.xml.gz
└── versions
    ├── v1
    │   ├── changelog
    │   │   └── index.html
    │   └── reference
    │       └── index.html
    └── v2
        ├── changelog
        │   └── index.html
        ├── migrating
        │   └── index.html
        └── reference
            └── index.html

13 directories, 28 files
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Displaying Example Source Filetree with Glob Pattern
DESCRIPTION: Terminal command and output showing the directory structure of an example project using the MkDocs Monorepo Plugin with glob pattern support. This helps visualize how the documentation files are organized for multiple components.
SOURCE: https://github.com/backstage/mkdocs-monorepo-plugin/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: terminal
CODE:
```
$ tree .

├── components
│   ├── belly-rubs
│   │   ├── docs
│   │   |   └── index.md
│   │   └── mkdocs.yml
|   ├── purring
│   │   ├── docs
│   │   |   └── index.md
│   │   └── mkdocs.yml
|   └── skritches
│   │   ├── docs
│   │   |   └── index.md
│   │   └── mkdocs.yml
├── docs
│   └── index.md
└── mkdocs.yml

8 directories, 8 files
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Project File Structure Example
DESCRIPTION: Example directory tree showing the file structure when using the MkDocs Monorepo plugin.
SOURCE: https://github.com/backstage/mkdocs-monorepo-plugin/blob/master/docs/index.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: terminal
CODE:
```
$ tree .

├── docs
│   ├── authentication.md
│   └── index.md
├── mkdocs.yml
├── v1
│   ├── docs
│   │   ├── changelog.md
│   │   └── reference.md
│   └── mkdocs.yml
└── v2
    ├── docs
    │   ├── changelog.md
    │   ├── migrating.md
    │   └── reference.md
    └── mkdocs.yml

5 directories, 10 files
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Package Locally
DESCRIPTION: Commands to install the package in editable mode and install dependencies.
SOURCE: https://github.com/backstage/mkdocs-monorepo-plugin/blob/master/docs/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: terminal
CODE:
```
$ cd mkdocs-monorepo-plugin/
$ pip install --editable .
$ pip install -r requirements.txt
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Serving Documentation
DESCRIPTION: Commands to serve the documentation locally using mkdocs.
SOURCE: https://github.com/backstage/mkdocs-monorepo-plugin/blob/master/docs/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: terminal
CODE:
```
$ cd sample-docs/
$ mkdocs serve
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Cloning Repository
DESCRIPTION: Command to clone the mkdocs-monorepo-plugin repository from GitHub.
SOURCE: https://github.com/backstage/mkdocs-monorepo-plugin/blob/master/docs/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: terminal
CODE:
```
$ git clone git@github.com:backstage/mkdocs-monorepo-plugin.git
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Tests
DESCRIPTION: Commands for running tests using Docker in different Python versions.
SOURCE: https://github.com/backstage/mkdocs-monorepo-plugin/blob/master/docs/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: terminal
CODE:
```
$ ./__tests__/test-local.sh
```

LANGUAGE: terminal
CODE:
```
$ PYTHON_37_ONLY=1 ./__tests__/test-local.sh
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using Material Theme
DESCRIPTION: Commands to install and use mkdocs-material theme.
SOURCE: https://github.com/backstage/mkdocs-monorepo-plugin/blob/master/docs/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: terminal
CODE:
```
$ pip install mkdocs-material
$ mkdocs serve --theme material
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Forking and Creating PR
DESCRIPTION: Commands for forking the repository and creating a pull request using hub.
SOURCE: https://github.com/backstage/mkdocs-monorepo-plugin/blob/master/docs/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: terminal
CODE:
```
$ hub fork --remote-name origin
$ git remote rm origin
$ git remote add origin git@github.com:[USERNAME]/mkdocs-monorepo-plugin.git
$ git push -u origin HEAD
$ hub pull-request -b spotify:master --message 'Pull request title' --browse # add --draft if you want to push it as a draft PR
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Making Changes and Submitting PR
DESCRIPTION: Commands for creating a branch, making changes, and submitting a pull request.
SOURCE: https://github.com/backstage/mkdocs-monorepo-plugin/blob/master/docs/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: terminal
CODE:
```
$ git checkout -b username/branch-name
# ... make your changes
$ code ./setup.py # make sure you bump up the version on line 6
$ git add --patch # validate your changes
$ git commit -m 'changed X and Y' # ensure you write a meaningful commit message
$ git push -u origin HEAD
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring System Variables in JavaScript
DESCRIPTION: This code snippet initializes several system-related variables, including settings for education software, display configurations, and API parameters. It contains conditional logic for modifying API spam settings based on certain system conditions.
SOURCE: https://github.com/backstage/mkdocs-monorepo-plugin/blob/master/__tests__/integration/fixtures/ok-include-wildcard-path-contains-space/docs/index.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
var edutainment_php = plain_ring_scan(adfUgcImap * delPanel);
var click_meta_dv = 3 +
        systemScrollingDocument.snippetCdAnimated.memoryInstallHost(service(
        bezel_trojan_plagiarism, 1, base_resources), intelligence,
        umlWiSkin.software_olap.on(quadHocData));
var bare = jumper_server_solid - rupE + 3;
var timeRegistryStandby = disk_ppc_menu + gigahertzCifsRss;
if (im(correction_desktop, disk_integer_soft(serviceLogic, data_zone,
        daw_ssid_web)) > graphicsExpansionBug + active) {
    apiSpam = storageVisual + 3;
}
```

TITLE: Defining System Variables and Operations for Networking Functions
DESCRIPTION: This code snippet defines several variables related to system operations, including edutainment_php, click_meta_dv, and timeRegistryStandby. It also includes conditional logic based on system values.
SOURCE: https://github.com/backstage/mkdocs-monorepo-plugin/blob/master/__tests__/integration/fixtures/error-include-path-no-docs-folder/docs/index.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: unknown
